title: impossibile inviare mail con thunderbird
content: da una settimana non riesco ad inviare mail. Questa è la mascherina che esce dopo il mancato invio: Invio del messaggio non riuscito. Si è verificato un errore durante l’invio della posta. Il server di posta ha risposto: SX3h2C02P3BlYun01X3i3j Spam Detected. Controllare il messaggio e riprovare.
creator: accatino

title: Non si apre una pagina
content:
Buongiorno, chiedo cortesemente un aiuto perché dopo tanti anni che utilizzo Mozilla, da ieri sera non mi si carica e non si apre più una pagina di Amazon di lavoro. Il link è questo:

https://sellercentral.amazon.it/ap/signin?clientContext=257-4660479-5358727&openid.pape.max_auth_age=900&openid.return_to=https%3A%2F%2Fsellercentral.amazon.it%2Finventory%2Fref%3Dxx_invmgr_favb_xx%3Ftbla_myitable%3Dsort%3A%257B%2522sortOrder%2522%253A%2522DESCENDING%2522%257D%3Bsearch%3A977770%3Bpagination%3A1%3B&openid.identity=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0%2Fidentifier_select&openid.assoc_handle=sc_it_amazon_v2&openid.mode=checkid_setup&openid.claimed_id=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0%2Fidentifier_select&openid.ns=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0&mons_redirect=sign_in

con altri Browser si apre ma io sono 15 anni che utlizzo Mozilla e mi sembra incredibile. Il resto funziona tutto. Grazie, saluti.
creator: giorgettigiorgio1969

title: Can no longer detach tabs in Firefox 126
content:
Tab detachment was working fine until updating to Firefox 126. Now the tabs cannot be moved, detached or dragged to another window.

In about:config, browser.tabs.allowTabDetach is set to true

Suggestions?
creator: quant

title: Cannot drag tab to detach it from the current window
content:
After updating to the current version of my OS(listed below) I can no longer drag a tab to detach it from the firefox window. Doing so drags a preview of the tab, but it is never separated from the current window. I can drag it to an already existing window to move tabs from one window to another, but not to create a new window from a single tab.

OS: Manjaro Linux 24.0.0 Wynsdey Linux kernel version: 6.6.30-2-MANJARO (64-bit) Desktop Environment: KDE Plasma 6.0.4 KDE Framework version: 6.1.0 QT Version: 6.7.0 Display Server: Wayland Firefox version: 125.0.3 (64-bit)
creator: ejhallmark

title: The email for FireFox has been changed from Cox as the server for this email address to Yahoo
content: the email used for FireFox - glennww@cox.net was transferred to Yahoo. I can not seem to download emails sent to this email address into Firefox as I was able to do prior to shifting to Yahoo. I went in and changed the password to the new password and to the new POP server (pop.mail.yahoo.com) but emails can not be retrieved. What am I doing wrong. I deleted the email account glennww@cox.net and tried to re-install as a new account, but it was not accepted. I don't know where to go
creator: glennww

creator: rechaugustoo

title: Translate Icon and Menu Item do not appear?
content:
I was browsing a webpage that turned out to be in Portuguese, and I was looking for how to translate it, but the internet indicated that Firefox has built in transation! However, neither the Translate Toolbar Icon nor the Translate menu option appear, even if I visit a site that absolutely should be translatable (https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mozilla_Firefox)

Additionally, if I go to Settings -> General, there is a Translations section, but if I click the Settings button, there are no languages in any of the boxes and no option to add any.

I am on Firefox 126.0 for Windows.

Here are the things I have tried:

  • Restarting Firefox
  • Rebooting my PC
  • Disabling all my extensions
  • Running Firefox in Troubleshooting Mode
  • Clearing my Startup Cache
  • Performing a "Refresh Firefox"
  • Toggling and Untoggling browser.translations.enable and browser.translations.automaticallyPopup

Does anyone have any suggestions of something I could have missed?
creator: mpureka

title: Dark background
content: I am forced to switch over to the browser Brave, have been a true Firefox supporter but am unable to change the background from dark back to light, this has nothing to do with the computer desktop settings since Brave, Edge and Google Chrome all are still running with the light background. Please help since I find this unacceptable, have problems reading with the dark background. Regards, Art.
creator: postuma
